name: Word Sauce: Connect Puzzle!
description:
Word Sauce: Addictive Puzzle Game with tons of intriguing levels to solve!

Super fun word search game that will certainly keep you hooked!
Find all hidden words made from combinations of letters! Intuitive to use, just connect word cookies (word chips - letters) with your finger!
Workout your brain in our brain puzzle with many challenging levels.

- Simple and intuitive gameplay

- Guess hidden words using only provided letters

- Discover extra words for bonus gold

- Invite your friends and receive daily prizes

- Use hints or ask your friend to help


Have fun playing Word Sauce with your family and friends, suitable for all ages!
